           <tei-sourceDesc data-origname="sourceDesc">
              <tei-bibl data-origname="bibl">The Welte-Mignon</tei-bibl>
              <tei-biblFull data-origname="biblFull">
                 <tei-titleStmt data-origname="titleStmt">
                    <tei-title level="m" type="main" data-origname="title" data-origatts="type level">
                        The Welte-Mignon
                    </tei-title>
                    <tei-title level="m" type="sub" data-origname="title" data-origatts="type level">
                        Brings to your home ...
                    </tei-title>
                    <tei-author data-origname="author">
                       <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Geo J. Birkel Company</tei-orgName>
                    </tei-author>

                 <tei-publicationStmt data-origname="publicationStmt">
                    <tei-publisher data-origname="publisher">
                       <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Los Angeles Herald</tei-orgName>
                    </tei-publisher>
                    <tei-pubPlace ref="https://www.geonames.org/5368361" data-origname="pubPlace" data-origatts="ref">Los Angeles</tei-pubPlace>
                    <tei-date type="publication" data-origname="date" data-origatts="type">1909</tei-date>
                 </tei-publicationStmt>

                    <tei-biblScope unit="issue" data-origname="biblScope" data-origatts="unit">Feb 21 1909, Part II</tei-biblScope>

                    <tei-idno type="URLImages" data-origname="idno" data-origatts="type">https://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn85042462/1909-02-21/ed-1/seq-17/</tei-idno>

    <tei-facsimile data-origname="facsimile">
        <tei-surface data-origname="surface">
            <tei-graphic url="los-angeles-1909.png" width="676" height="1810" data-origname="graphic" data-origatts="height width url" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="20,18 19,513 657,522 656,18" id="eSc_textblock_b620cf2e" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="397,562 385,574 398,583 642,615 646,690 622,698 646,703 645,805 156,802 155,824 36,823 36,591 72,579 288,583 297,571 288,567 288,524 393,524" id="eSc_textblock_f1d73028" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="602,844 598,1133 582,1142 598,1150 598,1378 582,1383 598,1391 598,1511 570,1523 590,1528 607,1560 646,1568 646,1704 614,1732 579,1732 570,1781 104,1776 83,1736 40,1728 20,1708 28,1568 76,1531 76,844 87,832" id="eSc_textblock_b2073d40" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
        </tei-surface>
    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_b620cf2e" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
            <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
                <tei-desc resp="#np" data-origname="desc" data-origatts="resp">
                    Illustration of a Welte-Mignon.
                </tei-desc>
            </tei-figure>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>DESIGN
            OF OAK CASE
        </tei-div>

            <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_f1d73028" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
                <tei-head data-origname="head">
                    <tei-hi rendition="#c" class="c" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>THE
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> 
                    </tei-hi>
                </tei-head>
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
                <tei-seg ana="#home" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    Brings to your home
                </tei-seg> the actual living perform-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ances of
                <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/11918625X" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Hofmann</tei-persName>,
                <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/124379923" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Lhevinne</tei-persName>,
                <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118986724" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Paderewski</tei-persName>,
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
                <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/116204400" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Bloomfield-Zeisler</tei-persName>
                and
                <tei-num type="cardinal" subtype="artist-count" value="100" data-origname="num" data-origatts="value subtype type">
                    a hundred
                </tei-num>
                other great
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>pianists.
            </tei-div>
            
            <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_b2073d40" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
                <tei-p data-origname="p">
                    <tei-seg ana="#technical_invention" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The science of musical reproduction has progressed
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>through the various stages-experiment, medioc-
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>rity, excellence-but until the introduction of the
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name>
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>it has never reached supreme per-
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>fection. But today the science has reached its
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>apex, the goal has been attained and beyond the splendid
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>achievement realized in the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> it is im-
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>possible to go.
                    </tei-seg>
                </tei-p>
                <tei-p data-origname="p">
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> brings to the
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>music-lover the actual performances of every great living pian-
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ist.
                    
                    <tei-seg ana="#immortality" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="ana">
                        It perpetuates these performances so that fu-
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ture generations will enjoy the music of our
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>present-day virtuosos when their personalities are
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>but misty memories.
                    </tei-seg>
                </tei-p>
                <tei-p data-origname="p">
                    <tei-seg ana="#analogy_to_phonograph" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>What the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Victor</tei-name> is doing for the famous singers
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of the world the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> is
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>accomplishing for the pianists.
                    </tei-seg>
                    But with this difference: The
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Victor</tei-name> registers the voice vibrations on the disc,
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>whereas the sensitive reproducing devices of the
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> are of such nature that every dupli-
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>cate performance IS MADE DIRECTLY ON THE
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>PIANO,
                    <tei-seg ana="#exact_reproduction" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="ana">
                        thereby reproducing in every detail of
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>touch, tone and technique the actual
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>renditions of the pianists, in every sense their original per-
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>formances.
                    </tei-seg>
                </tei-p>
                <tei-p data-origname="p">
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The series of instruments containing the repro-
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>duction devices are the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name>, as illustrated
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>above, the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Steinway-Welte</tei-name>, an upright
                    <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Steinway</tei-name>
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>piano combined with the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name>, and the
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Cabinet-Welte</tei-name>, which may be attached to any grand
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>or upright piano of any make.
                </tei-p>

                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Call or Write for Descriptive Literature
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>We will gladly mail to interested parties descriptive literature and
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>prices of the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> instruments. We are especially desirous
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>that you come to our store and give these instruments your personal
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>inspection.

                <tei-hi rendition="#c" class="c" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>FREE RECITALS DAILY FROM 9 A. M. TO 5 P.M-Fourth Floor.
                </tei-hi>

                <tei-hi rendition="#c" class="c" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-orgName key="birkel" data-origname="orgName" data-origatts="key">Geo J. Birkel Company</tei-orgName>
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
                    <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Steinway</tei-name>,
                    <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Cecilian</tei-name> and
                    <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Victor</tei-name> Dealers.
                    <tei-address data-origname="address">
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>345-347 South Spring Street
                    </tei-address>
                </tei-hi>
            </tei-div>
    </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
